Package org.apache.prepbuddy.smoothers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KeyPartitioner
    A Patitioner that puts each row in a partition that we specify by key.
    SimpleMovingAverageMethod
    A smoothing method which smooths data based on Simple Moving Average which is the unweighted mean of the previous n data.
    SimpleSlidingWindow
    A sliding window which calculates the unweighted mean of a window for Simple Moving Average.
    SlidingWindow
    A window for smoothing data.
    SmoothingMethod  
    WeightedMovingAverageMethod
    A smoothing method which smooths data based on Weighted Moving Average method that is any average that has multiplying factors to give different weights to data at different positions in the sample window.
    WeightedSlidingWindow
    A sliding window which calculates the weighted mean of a window for Weighted Moving Average.
    Weights
    Contains weights in sequence for the weighted sliding window.
